short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Release the wall from imposed content

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Grey out suggested content and ads on the Facebook wall. It will be a relief to distinguish what is your contacts' content and what is just random stuff because FB did not have a clue what to display.
